text: Aasif's paper titled "An LPTV Programmable Bandpass True-time-Delay Line Without External Clock-Phase Shifter" has been accepted for ISCAS 2025.
Harish joins the group to pursue his MSR. Welcome Harish.
Aadil joins the group to pursue his Ph.D. Welcome Aadil.
Aasif's paper titled "A Low-Loss, Compact Wideband True-Time-Delay Line for Sub-6GHz Applications using N-Path Filters" has been accepted for APCCAS 2023.
Mayank's paper titled "A Robust Overdesign Prevention Circuit Technique Under Widely Varying Ambient Conditions" has been accepted for APCCAS 2023.
Kunal and Vibhor defend their M.Tech thesis. Congratulations to both!
Sushil bags proficiency medal in convocation 2023.
Sushil, Vinayak and Kaustubh defend their BT-MT thesis.
Kaustubh selected for IEEE MTTS undergraduate scholarship.
Abhishek's paper "An Automatic Leakage Compensation..." accepted in IEEE ISCAS 2023.
Nitish defends his BT-MT thesis.
Mayank and Harshit's paper "Bandwidth-Enhanced..." to be presented in ISCAS 2022.
Kautuk defends his M.Tech project.
Mayank receives PMRF scholarship for Ph.D.
Mayank defended his BT-MT project and joined as Ph.D. candidate.
Harshit's paper "Breaking the trade-off..." accepted in IEEE ISCAS 2021.
Paper "Analysis and comparison of distortion..." presented in ISCAS 2020.
"Effects of AC Response Imperfections..." published in IEEE TCAS II.
Parthasarathi, Anteshwar and Prashanth defend their M.Tech thesis.
Aasif & Anteshwar win Qualcomm Innovation Fellowship India 2020.
